participant_1.background:
My worst fear is losing my ability to write.
i work full time in an office , so i don t have much time to practice.
I like to spend rainy days in my studio, practicing my dance moves.
I spend time tending to my flower beds to keep my mind clear and at peace.
i have one child.

participant_2.background:
I try to avoid snakes and spend quality time with my family every day.
I'm not close to my family, so I don't know what their reaction would be.
i collect little figurines.
i like to sing.
i write short films.

content.text: Hello there! How has your day been?
Hello to you too! My day has been pretty good. Just got home from the office. How about yours?
Not bad, not bad. I have one kid and I work full time, so my days are pretty busy.
Oh wow, two very important things! I have one kid too, and I work part time.
Do you like your job? What do you do?
I love my job! I love writing short films. What about you? What do you do?
I work in an office. I don't really like it, but it pays the bills.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. But I'm glad you get to spend time with your kid.
Yeah, I am very grateful for that. My kid is my world.
I know what you mean. My kid is my everything.
What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to sing, write short films, and spend time with my family. What about you?
I like to tend to my flower beds, practice my dance moves, and write.
That sounds really nice. I love flowers! I'm not very good at dancing, but I like to try.
I'm not very good at singing either, but I like to do it anyway.
